attributes.action: Introduce a two part driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a two part driving test, the firststage to remain unchanged, but prohibit newly qualified drivers from driving on the motorway until a further test has been passed which would include motorway driving and the number of driving faults reduced to 9. This second test to be taken and passed within 18 months of passing initial test.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
